mscAtmIfUniEbrRowStatus.description: This variable is used as the basis for SNMP naming of mscAtmIfUniEbr components. These components can be added and deleted.

mscAtmIfUniEbrComponentName.name: mscAtmIfUniEbrComponentName
mscAtmIfUniEbrComponentName.description: This variable provides the component's string name for use with the ASCII Console Interface

mscAtmIfUniEbrStorageType.name: mscAtmIfUniEbrStorageType
mscAtmIfUniEbrStorageType.description: This variable represents the storage type value for the mscAtmIfUniEbr tables.

mscAtmIfUniEbrIndex.name: mscAtmIfUniEbrIndex
mscAtmIfUniEbrIndex.description: This variable represents the index for the mscAtmIfUniEbr tables.

mscAtmIfUniEbrProvTable.name: mscAtmIfUniEbrProvTable
mscAtmIfUniEbrProvTable.description: This group contains the provisionable attributes for Edge Based Rerouting at the ATM Signaling interface.

mscAtmIfUniEbrConnectionRecovery.name: mscAtmIfUniEbrConnectionRecovery
mscAtmIfUniEbrConnectionRecovery.description: This attribute specifies the subscription of connections to hard rerouting. dynamic: Connections that are transiting through this interface. provisioned: SPVC and SPVP connections that are provisioned at this interface. Description of bits: dynamic(0) provisioned(1)

mscAtmIfUniEbrPathOptimization.name: mscAtmIfUniEbrPathOptimization
mscAtmIfUniEbrPathOptimization.description: This attribute specifies the subscription of connections to soft rerouting. dynamic: Connections that are transiting through this interface. provisioned: SPVC and SPVP connections that are provisioned at this interface. Description of bits: dynamic(0) provisioned(1)

mscAtmIfUniEbrOperTable.name: mscAtmIfUniEbrOperTable
mscAtmIfUniEbrOperTable.description: This group contains the operational attributes that indicate the rerouting activities for an ATM Signaling interface.

mscAtmIfUniEbrSubscribedConnections.name: mscAtmIfUniEbrSubscribedConnections
mscAtmIfUniEbrSubscribedConnections.description: This attribute indicates the number of connections subscribed to rerouting capabilities.

mscAtmIfUniEbrEligibleRecoveredConnectio.name: mscAtmIfUniEbrEligibleRecoveredConnections
mscAtmIfUniEbrEligibleRecoveredConnectio.description: This attribute indicates the number of connections that have been recovered and are eligible for path optimization. The count is reset to zero when the Optimize command is executed on this component.

mscAtmIfUniEbrIneligibleRecoveredConnect.name: mscAtmIfUniEbrIneligibleRecoveredConnections
mscAtmIfUniEbrIneligibleRecoveredConnect.description: This attribute indicates the number of connections that have been recovered but are not eligible for path optimization. The value decreases as counted connections are released. The count is not reset by the Optimize command.

mscAtmIfUniEbrStatsTable.name: mscAtmIfUniEbrStatsTable
mscAtmIfUniEbrStatsTable.description: This group contains the statistics related to Edge Based Rerouting.

mscAtmIfUniEbrTotalConnectionRecoveries.name: mscAtmIfUniEbrTotalConnectionRecoveries
mscAtmIfUniEbrTotalConnectionRecoveries.description: This attribute counts connection recovery, or hard reroute, events that occur. The counter wraps to 0 when the maximum value is exceeded.

mscAtmIfUniEbrTotalPathOptimizations.name: mscAtmIfUniEbrTotalPathOptimizations
mscAtmIfUniEbrTotalPathOptimizations.description: This attributes counts path optimization, or soft reroute, events that occur. The counter wraps to 0 when the maximum value is exceeded.

mscAtmIfVptUniEbrIndex.description: This variable represents the index for the mscAtmIfVptUniEbr tables.

mscAtmIfVptUniEbrConnectionRecovery.name: mscAtmIfVptUniEbrConnectionRecovery
mscAtmIfVptUniEbrConnectionRecovery.description: This attribute specifies the subscription of connections to hard rerouting. dynamic: Connections that are transiting through this interface. provisioned: SPVC and SPVP connections that are provisioned at this interface. Description of bits: dynamic(0) provisioned(1)

mscAtmIfVptUniEbrPathOptimization.name: mscAtmIfVptUniEbrPathOptimization
mscAtmIfVptUniEbrPathOptimization.description: This attribute specifies the subscription of connections to soft rerouting. dynamic: Connections that are transiting through this interface. provisioned: SPVC and SPVP connections that are provisioned at this interface. Description of bits: dynamic(0) provisioned(1)

mscAtmIfVptUniEbrOperTable.name: mscAtmIfVptUniEbrOperTable
mscAtmIfVptUniEbrOperTable.description: This group contains the operational attributes that indicate the rerouting activities for an ATM Signaling interface.

mscAtmIfVptUniEbrSubscribedConnections.name: mscAtmIfVptUniEbrSubscribedConnections
mscAtmIfVptUniEbrSubscribedConnections.description: This attribute indicates the number of connections subscribed to rerouting capabilities.

mscAtmIfVptUniEbrEligibleRecoveredConnec.name: mscAtmIfVptUniEbrEligibleRecoveredConnections
mscAtmIfVptUniEbrEligibleRecoveredConnec.description: This attribute indicates the number of connections that have been recovered and are eligible for path optimization. The count is reset to zero when the Optimize command is executed on this component.

mscAtmIfVptUniEbrIneligibleRecoveredConn.name: mscAtmIfVptUniEbrIneligibleRecoveredConnections
mscAtmIfVptUniEbrIneligibleRecoveredConn.description: This attribute indicates the number of connections that have been recovered but are not eligible for path optimization. The value decreases as counted connections are released. The count is not reset by the Optimize command.

mscAtmIfVptUniEbrStatsTable.name: mscAtmIfVptUniEbrStatsTable
mscAtmIfVptUniEbrStatsTable.description: This group contains the statistics related to Edge Based Rerouting.

mscAtmIfVptUniEbrTotalConnectionRecoveri.name: mscAtmIfVptUniEbrTotalConnectionRecoveries
mscAtmIfVptUniEbrTotalConnectionRecoveri.description: This attribute counts connection recovery, or hard reroute, events that occur. The counter wraps to 0 when the maximum value is exceeded.

mscAtmIfVptUniEbrTotalPathOptimizations.name: mscAtmIfVptUniEbrTotalPathOptimizations
mscAtmIfVptUniEbrTotalPathOptimizations.description: This attributes counts path optimization, or soft reroute, events that occur. The counter wraps to 0 when the maximum value is exceeded.
